title: Non-verbal hypnotic induction TRABONA METHOD
description:
In this video Dr. Marco Paret is demonstrating a non-verbal hypnotic induction while explaining the Trabona method to his students on his course. Dr. Marco Paret is the world's main authority on mesmerism and fascination and all of these powerful techniques are taught exclusively and worldwide in his school for non-verbal hypnosis.  Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
